lines.text: You guys are ridiculous! I mean, I can't believe it! You don't even get laid in a whorehouse!
Sue Ann, would you care to dance with me?
Then I suppose a blow job is just COMPLETELY out of the question.

[while getting it on in the backseat of a car, hears motorcycle coming]
Aw, shit!

Ha-ha-ha. Well... actually... we're engaged to be married. He HATES when I do this, ha-ha-ha. Last guy he caught, he dragged behind his bike... in chains. Ha-ha-ha-ha-ha! Oh, don't worry. It was only over dirt!
He's too young to know what he wants.
Why don't you pick on someone your own age?
I'm sorry that I hit you.
I wished you would have shot me.
